channel.title: All my exposure effects (the real things)
channel.description:
These are all made by me, no one else so don't rip them. I am posting here because I don't want the same (orange) one whored in everyone's sprites (o.o) so enjoy and + rep is nice :)
[img]http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/8294/xposure1tk0.png[/img]
[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/6307/xposure2sy0.png[/img]
[img]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/9495/xposure3mt1.png[/img]
[img]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/3579/xposure4ox1.png[/img]
[img]http://img239.imageshack.us/img239/6462/xposure5ls8.png[/img]
[img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/606/xposure6hk7.png[/img]
[img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/8409/xposure7jo4.png[/img]
Remember to set them to Lighten for best results ;) If you want to post them elsewhere, contact me through PM first and I will give you permission!

item.title: All my exposure effects (the real things)
item.dc:creator: @Immortal Immortal
item.description:
@Immortal wrote:

kaza - I posted them on GR
Greek - thx
goatee - exposure = camera exposure, though mine don’t involve using a camera at all

I won’t tell you how to make them because they are my secrets

Read full topic
